iati-activity.title: The Project for Purchase of Recycled Ambulance for Montfort Hospital
iati-activity.description: Project for purchase of recycled ambulance from Japan to strengthen referral deliveries from rural areas to both the local hospital and Queen Elizabeth Hospital at Blantyre. This will assist in improving health services in outreach clinics.

iati-activity.title: The Project for Procurement of a Recycled Ambulance for Nkhoma CCAP Hospital
iati-activity.description: The project for supply of equiped and recycled ambulance from Japan to facilitate the transfer of referral cases from the hospital to Kamuzu Central Hospital. This will assist in improving emergency care and referral system.

iati-activity.title: the Project for Selected Market Centres and Rural Water Supply in Mchinji and Kasungu District
iati-activity.description: To construct water supply faiclities and thereby improve living condition

iati-activity.title: The Project for Supply of Safe Water in T/A Santhe and Wimbe in Kasungu District
iati-activity.description: Project for constructing 85 Elephant Pumps and having 11 workshops for its maitenance and hygiene for the people living in T/A Santhe and Wimbe to improve their access to safe water. This will assist them to improve their health and hygine.

location.name: T/A Santhe and T/A Wimbe, Kasungu

iati-activity.title: the Project for Re-Construction and Expansion of Selected Community Day Secondary Schools (Phase II)
iati-activity.description: To construct school facilities and thereby improve educational environment

location.name: Lilongwe, Salima, Nkhotakota, Nkhatabay, and Mzimba District

iati-activity.title: The Project for the Replacement of Air Navigation System at Kamuzu International Airport
The Project for Rehabilitation of School Facilities for Kasungu Secondary School
iati-activity.description: Project for rehabilitation of 2 boys' hostels and a dining hall with a kitchen for Kasungu Secondary School for the improvement of school hygiene and boys' boarding environment. This will encourage effective learning and good health.

iati-activity.title: Comprehensive rural development based on transfer of environment-friendly agricultural technology
iati-activity.description: Comprehensive rural development based on environment-friendly agricultural technology, public health, and recyclable energy.

iati-activity.title: The Project for Rehabilitation of Infrastructures for Mkoma Health Centre in Mzimba District
iati-activity.description: Project for expansion of maternity labour ward, rehabilitation of the main facility and 4 staff houses and also construction of new pit latrines at Mkoma Health Centre in Mzimba District for safe delivery and quality health services.

iati-activity.title: The Project for Construction of Biwi Clinic in Lilongwe City
iati-activity.description: Biwi clinic provides basic health services for residents of Biwi, Kaliyeka, Mchesi and Area 22. This project will assist in providing quick access of permanent services in the area, especially pregnant women in receiving both antenatal and postnatal in a conducive environment.

iati-activity.title: The Project for Expansion of DAPP Amalika Teacher Training College through Construction of Additional Student Hostels
iati-activity.description: The project aims to facilitate the training of qualified teachers through construction of additional student hostels for the DAPP Amalika teacher training college.

iati-activity.title: Comprehensive rural development project based on transfer of environment-friendly agricultural technology and improvement of public health Phase 3
iati-activity.description: To develop human resources by income-generating activities with agricultural products and to build a business model that promotes spirally activation of local industry and improvement of the lives of local residents.

iati-activity.title: Follow-up Expense of the Project for Rehabilitation of School Facilities for Kasungu Secondary School
iati-activity.description: Follow-up expense for the project for rehabilitation of 2 boys' hostels and a dining hall with a kitchen for Kasungu Secondary School for the improvement of school hygiene and boys' boarding environment. This will encourage effective learning and good health.

iati-activity.title: Follow-up Expense of the Project for Construction of School Blocks at Ngwenya LEA School
iati-activity.description: Fllow-up expense for the project for construction of 3 school blocks at Ngwenya LEA School to improve the pupils' learning environment because more than half pupils learn outside the classrooms. After completing the project, more than 85% of them will be able to learn inside.

iati-activity.title: the Project for Replacement of South Rukuru Bridge on the Main Road M001 (Phase II)
iati-activity.description: To replace bridge and improve cargo and paasanger transportation

iati-activity.title: The Project for Groundwater Development in Mwanza and Neno
The Project for Replacement of South Rukuru Bridge on the Main Road M001
iati-activity.description: Replacement of South Rukuru Bridge on the Main Road M001
